item.title: Signing android release apk from the command line (via ant)
item.description: This post is probably out too late ,as almost all IDE’s these days (which support android development) ,probably have an Integrated release signing or debug signing utility/wizard built in, but if somebody is using an old IDE or perhaps want to integrate release in a CI(continues integration) environment , this tutorial might come in handy. Basically one has to sign an apk either with a debug key (which is generally present in your .
